originalText.text: Le Parc is in a very convenient location in Manhattan, offers a spacious and bright office area, nice amenities and a rather cozy common room. The staff in the building are very responsible/kind, and quick to provide all help necessary. Highly recommended

text.text: Le Parc is in a very convenient location in Manhattan, offers a spacious and bright office area, nice amenities and a rather cozy common room. The staff in the building are very responsible/kind, and quick to provide all help necessary. Highly recommended

originalText.text:
I wanted to take a moment to express my appreciation and satisfaction with the experience I've had at leParc.  I've thoroughly enjoyed my time here, and I'd like to share my thoughts

The office design is both functional and aesthetically pleasing. The ergonomic chairs and spacious workstations make it a pleasure to work here daily.

Amenities and Facilities: the facilities are well-maintained. From high-speed internet to the well-stocked kitchen area, very clean and quite space.

Responsive Staff: The staff at leParc have been exceptional. They're always ready to assist with any queries or concerns promptly. Their friendly and professional demeanor adds to the overall positive experience

originalText.text: Great location on Park Avenue South, steps from Madison Square Park and Gramercy Park. So many great restaurants and bars around the building. The building sits on 6 train subway station with very easy access to R, W, F, M and 1 subway stations. Staffs are extremely friendly and attentive, lobby is always clean, service is wonderful and most importantly, internet is very fast.

originalText.text: LeParc Coworking Offices is a fantastic new coworking facility located in the heart of Gramercy. They have several different sizes of available offices,  as well as common areas. The quiet office spaces allows me to complete my work in a very comfortable and warm environment. The friendly staff is always on call to assist me in anything that I need.
